resources.string: 成功发送邀请，请等待小伙伴加入!
成功提交加入请求，请等待小伙伴回复!
再输入一次想使用的密码
请等当前位置出现在地图上以后再尝试.
该手机不支持谷歌商店 !
不能访问服务器，请重新登录 !
非常感谢您的反馈，动动产品组将根据您的反馈不断完善产品和提高性能!\n\n @动动产品组
没有其他参赛者加入，请继续等待!
成功发送好友请求信息
请扫描二维码加我为好友
You must fill in a profile name
Allow anyone to add you using your profile name
You must fill in all fields
Profile name can\'t contain spaces or backslashes/forwardslashes
没有检测到网络信号，仅能使用有限的功能
嗨，请接受我的好友请求!
拉黑这个好友，将从好友列表里面删掉他们同时再也不能接收他们的好友请求.\n\n是否真的继续拉黑?
这个应用要求二维码扫描软件，想安装吗?
用户名长度应超过个6个字符!
密码长度应超过6个字符!
不能再次加入自己的比赛!
选择身份证复印件相片
场馆经营者身份证复印件
请等待，正在审核过程中
对不起，没有获得天气信息.
1. 触摸上面的每一项，来设置日期，时间和留言
2. 这个20元是场馆预定押金
3. 用户按约在场馆完成比赛，现场支付场馆费用，预定押金将原额返还
4. 场馆预定不成功，预定押金将原额返还
1. 触摸上面的每一项，来设置运动类型，地点，时间和内容
根据双方约定，在场馆完成运动以后，场馆预定押金将原额返还
1. 请确认场馆，时间和手机号码
2. 场馆预定押金将被返还到支付账户
我们将通知您预定结果和原额返还您的预定场馆押金
2. 触摸手机号码选项来设置手机号码，用于接受短信认证码
1. 请核实会员，费用和手机号码
2. 如果支付成功，将会接收到短信认证码，凭短信认证码去场馆锻炼
凭短信认证码去场馆锻炼
支付成功，将会接收到短信认证码

string.name: eula_accept
string.translation_description: In the 'Terms of Service' dialog, the button to accept.

string.name: eula_body
string.translation_description: The body in the 'Terms of Service. See http://m.google.com/toscountry. %1$s host name, 'm.google.com'

resources.string: 使用 Google 的移动产品和服务（“服务”），即表示您同意接受不时更新的以下条款的约束： a) 适用于 YouTube 相关服务的 YouTube 使用条款 (%1$s/tos_youtube)； b) 适用于地图服务、本地服务和位置服务的 Google 地图条款及条件 (%1$s/tos_maps)； c) 适用于图书相关服务的 Google 图书服务条款 (%1$s/tos_books)；以及 d) 适用于所有其他服务并且经常更新的 Google 服务条款 (%1$s/utos)。

string.name: eula_copyright_year
string.translation_description: The copyright year in the 'Terms of Service'. See http://m.google.com/toscountry. \u00A9 is the unicode value for the copyright symbol.

string.name: eula_date
string.translation_description: The date in the 'Terms of Service'. See http://m.google.com/toscountry.

string.name: eula_decline
string.translation_description: In the 'Terms of Service' dialog, the button to decline.

string.name: eula_footer
string.translation_description: The footer in the 'Terms of Service'. See http://m.google.com/toscountry. %1$s host name, 'm.google.com'

resources.string: 您可以在 %1$s/legalnotices 找到关于第三方内容的归属或法律通知的必要说明。

string.name: export_all_option
string.translation_description: When exporting all tracks to the external storage, the option to export as a certain file format. %1$s the file format. E.g., 'KML'. %2$s the directory. E.g., '/MyTracks/kml'.

resources.string: 全部以 %1$s 格式导出到 %2$s

string.name: export_all_title
string.translation_description: The dialog title to export all tracks to the external storage.

string.name: export_external_storage
string.translation_description: When exporting a track, the option to export to the external storage.

string.name: export_external_storage_error
string.translation_description: When exporting tracks to the external storage, the error message indicating that only some of the tracks are exported. %1$d the number of tracks successfully exported. E.g., '1'. %1$s the number of tracks to export. E.g., '2 tracks'. %2$s the directory. E.g., '/MyTracks/kml'.

resources.string: 已将%1$d条路线（共%2$s条）导出到%3$s

string.name: export_external_storage_option
string.translation_description: When exporting a track to the external storage, the option to export as a certain file format. %1$s the file format. E.g., 'KML'. %2$s the directory. E.g., '/MyTracks/kml'.

string.name: export_external_storage_progress_message
string.translation_description: When exporting tracks to the external storage, the progress message. %1$s the directory. E.g., '/MyTracks/kml'.

string.name: export_external_storage_success
string.translation_description: When exporting tracks to the external storage, the success message. %1$s the number of tracks. E.g., '2 tracks'. %2$s the directory. E.g., '/MyTracks/kml'.

string.name: export_google_drive
string.translation_description: When exporting a track, the option to export to Google Drive.

string.name: export_google_error
string.translation_description: When exporting a track, the error message. %1$s service name. E.g, Google Maps. %2$s service url. E.g, maps.google.com.

resources.string: 发生错误，无法导出至 %1$s (%2$s)，请重试。

string.name: export_google_error_public
string.translation_description: The error message when not able to make a track public. %1$s service name. E.g, Google Drive. %2$s service url. E.g, drive.google.com.

string.name: export_google_fusion_tables
string.translation_description: When exporting a track, the option to export to Google Fusion Tables.

string.name: export_google_fusion_tables_private
string.translation_description: When exporting a track to Google Fusion Tables, the option to export as a new private table as opposed to a new public table.

resources.string: 导出为新的不公开表格

string.name: export_google_fusion_tables_public
string.translation_description: When exporting a track to Google Fusion Tables, the option to export as a new public table as opposed to a new private table.

string.name: export_google_maps
string.translation_description: When exporting a track, the option to export to Google Maps.

string.name: export_google_maps_public
string.translation_description: When exporting a track to Google Maps, the option to export as a new public map as opposed to a new unlisted map.

string.name: export_google_maps_unlisted
string.translation_description: When exporting a track to Google Maps, the option to export as a new unlisted map as opposed to a new public map.

resources.string: 导出为新的非公开地图

string.name: export_google_spreadsheets
string.translation_description: When exporting a track, the option to export to Google Spreadsheets.

string.name: export_google_success
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, the additional comment on the bottom of the result page. %1$s service name. E.g, Google Maps. %2$s service url. E.g, maps.google.com.

resources.string: 路线已导出至 %1$s (%2$s)，可能要在几分钟后才会显示。

string.translation_description: The dialog title when exporting a track.

string.name: external_storage_not_available
string.translation_description: Error message when the external storage is not available.

string.name: external_storage_not_writable
string.translation_description: Error message when the external storage is not writable.

resources.string: 外部存储设备无法写入

string.name: files_few
string.translation_description: The phrase for 'few' files. This is used when the language requires special treatment of 'small' numbers. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals %1$d an integer number. The number is a small number.

string.name: files_many
string.translation_description: The phrase for 'many' files. This is used when the language requires special treatment of 'large' numbers. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals %1$d an integer number. The number is a large number.

string.name: files_one
string.translation_description: The phrase for 1 file. This is used when the language requires special treatment of numbers like one. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals

string.name: files_other
string.translation_description: The phrase for 'other' files. This is used when the language does not require special treatment of the given quantity (as with all numbers in Chinese). See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals %1$d an integer number.

string.name: files_two
string.translation_description: The phrase for 2 files. This is used when the language requires special treatment of numbers like two. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals

string.name: files_zero
string.translation_description: The phrase for 0 files. This is used when the language requires special treatment of the number 0. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals

string.name: gps_google_location_settings
string.translation_description: In Android, the Google location settings to modify location settings for all Google applications. See Settings -> Google -> Location settings.

string.name: gps_location_access
string.translation_description: In Android, the location access settings to modify location settings for all applications. See Settings -> Location access.

string.name: gps_disabled
string.translation_description: In the main view, the message on the top asking the user to enable GPS. %1$s location settings. E.g., 'Google location settings'.

resources.string: GPS 未启用，请点按此处转至 %1$s。按“后退”按钮返回。

string.name: gps_disabled_location_mode
string.translation_description: In the main view, the message on the top asking the user to select the high-accuracy location mode. %1$s location settings. E.g., 'Google location settings'.

resources.string: 请选择高准确度位置信息模式。点按这里可转至%1$s，按后退按钮可返回。

string.name: gps_disabled_my_location
string.translation_description: When pressing the my location button, the message indicating that the current location cannot be determined. %1$s location settings. E.g., 'Google location settings'.

resources.string: 无法确定当前位置。请进入%1$s启用更多位置来源，并确保 您看得到天空。请稍后再试。

string.name: gps_disabled_my_location_location_mode
string.translation_description: When pressing the my location button, the message indicating that the current location cannot be determined. %1$s location settings. E.g., 'Google location settings'.

resources.string: 无法确定当前位置。请进入%1$s选择高准确度位置信息模式，并确保 您看得到天空。请稍后再试。

string.translation_description: The message when unable to start GPS.

string.name: gps_stopping

string.name: gps_wait_for_better_signal
string.translation_description: In the main view, the message on the top indicating My Tracks is waiting for a better GPS signal.

string.name: gps_wait_for_signal
string.translation_description: In the main view, the message on the top indicating My Tracks is waiting for GPS signal.

string.translation_description: The accessibility description for an arrow image.

string.translation_description: The accessibility description for a marker icon, as opposed to a track icon.

string.translation_description: The accessibility description for the 'My Location' button.

string.translation_description: The accessibility description for a track icon, as opposed to a marker icon.

string.name: import_error
string.translation_description: When importing from the external storage, the error message indicating that only some of the files are imported. %1$d the number of files successfully imported. E.g., '2'. %2$s the number of files in the directory. E.g., '2 files'. %3$s the directory. E.g., '/MyTracks/kml'.

string.name: import_no_directory
string.translation_description: When importing from the external storage, the error message when the directory doesn't exist. %1$s the directory. E.g., '/MyTracks/kml'.

string.name: import_no_file
string.translation_description: When importing from the external storage, the message in the result dialog when there is no files to import. %1$s the directory. E.g., '/MyTracks/kml'.

resources.string: 没有可以导入的文件。请将设备连接到计算机，然后将要导入的文件 放入 %1$s。

string.name: import_no_file_title
string.translation_description: When importing from the external storage, the title in the result dialog when there is no files to import.

string.name: import_progress_message
string.translation_description: When importing from the external storage, the progress message. %1$s the directory. E.g., '/MyTracks/kml'.

string.name: import_selection_option
string.translation_description: When importing all from external storage, the option to import all the files of a certain file format. %1$s the file format. E.g., 'KML'. %2$s the directory. E.g., '/MyTracks/kml'.

string.name: import_selection_title
string.translation_description: The dialog title to import all from external storage.

string.name: import_success
string.translation_description: When importing from the external storage, the success message. %1$s the number of files. E.g., '2 files'. %2$s the directory. E.g., '/MyTracks/kml'.

resources.string: 所选标记将永久地从设备中删除

string.translation_description: When inserting a marker to indicate the start of a track, the marker's name. E.g., 'track_name (Start)'. %1$s track name. E.g., 'Grand Canyon trail'.

string.name: permission_notification_description
string.translation_description: The permission description the Google Play Store shows during app installation when the app wants to receive Google My Tracks notifications.

string.translation_description: The permission label the Google Play Store shows during app installation when the app wants to receive Google My Tracks notifications.

resources.string: 允许应用读取“Google 动动”数据。

string.translation_description: The permission label the Google Play Store shows during app installation when the app wants to read My Tracks data.

string.translation_description: The message when requesting permission. %1$s account name. E.g., 'foo@foo.com'.

string.translation_description: The permission description the Google Play Store shows during app installation when the app wants to write data to My Tracks.

resources.string: 没有与您的搜索相符的路线或标记

string.translation_description: For a marker returned in the search result, the text field indicating the track that the marker belongs to. %1$s track name. E.g., 'Grand Canyon trail'.

string.translation_description: Prompt shown when the user activates voice search, asking him to speak what will be searched for.

resources.string: 说出路线或标记的名称

string.name: send_google_by_my_tracks
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, a note indicating it is created by Google My Tracks on Android. %1$s the html anchor opening tag. Place this placeholder before the app name, 'Google My Tracks'. %2$s the html anchor closing tag. Place this placeholder after the app name, 'Google My Tracks'.

string.name: send_google_choose_account_title
string.translation_description: When sending to Google, the dialog title to choose a Google account.

string.name: send_google_no_account_message
string.translation_description: When sending to Google, the dialog message when no Google account is found.

resources.string: 转至“设置”->“添加帐户”以添加帐户

string.name: send_google_no_account_title
string.translation_description: When sending to Google, the dialog title when no Google account is found.

string.translation_description: When sending to Google, the message when not able to get account permission.

resources.string: 无法获得帐户权限，请确保已连上网络。

string.translation_description: When sending a track to a Google service, the progress message. %1$s service name. 'Google Maps', 'Google Fusion Tables', or 'Google Spreadsheets'.

string.name: send_google_track_part_label
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, the label to name segments of a large track. E.g., 'track_name (Part 1)'. %1$s track name. E.g., 'Grand Canyon trail'. %2$d part number. E.g., '1'.

string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the label for the battery level on the bike sensor. E.g., 'Battery level: 50 %'.

string.name: sensor_state_cadence
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the label for the cadence on the bike sensor. Cadence is the number of revolutions of the crank per minute. E.g., 'Cadence: 80 rpm'. Character limit: ~23 (1 line)

string.name: sensor_state_cadence_value
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the value for the 'Cadence'. Cadence is the number of revolutions of the crank per minute. E.g., 'Cadence: 80 rpm'. %1$d a number. E.g., '80'.

string.name: sensor_state_connected
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the 'Sensor state' value when the sensor has connected.

string.name: sensor_state_connecting
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the 'Sensor state' value when the sensor is connecting.

string.name: sensor_state_disconnected
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the 'Sensor state' value when the sensor has disconnected.

string.name: sensor_state_heart_rate
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the label for the heart rate from a heart rate sensor. E.g., 'Hear rate: 100 bpm'. Character limit: ~23 (1 line)

string.name: sensor_state_heart_rate_value
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the value for the 'Heart rate'. E.g., 'Hear rate: 100 bpm'. %1$d a number. E.g., '100'.

string.name: sensor_state_last_sensor_time
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the label for the last time the sensor has sent a data. E.g., 'Last sensor time: 10:05 am'.

string.name: sensor_state_power
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the label for the power from the bike sensor. Power is the power output of the rider. E.g., 'Power: 50 W'. Character limit: ~23 (1 line)

string.name: sensor_state_power_value
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the value for the 'Power'. Power is the power output of the rider. E.g., 'Power: 50 W'. %1$d a number. E.g., '50'.

string.name: sensor_state_sending
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the 'Sensor state' value when the sensor is sending data.

string.translation_description: In settings, the summary for an option that is not available during a track recording.

string.name: settings_show
string.translation_description: In settings, the section label to show additional values. Character limit: ~26 (1 line)

string.translation_description: In the 'Settings' page, the 'Advanced' options. Character limit: ~26 (1 line)

string.name: settings_advanced_photo_size_original
string.translation_description: In the 'Advanced' settings, under the 'Photo size' option, the value to use the original photo size.

string.translation_description: In the 'Advanced' settings, the summary for the 'Photo size' option. %1$s value. E.g., '1 MB'.

resources.string: 将照片大小调整为%1$s，以便导出

string.translation_description: In the 'Advanced' settings, the option to set the photo size.

string.translation_description: In the 'Chart' settings, the option to display the x axis by distance.

string.translation_description: In the 'Chart' settings, the option to display the x axis by time.

string.translation_description: In the 'Chart' settings, the option to change the x axis display, either by distance or by time. Character limit: ~23 (1 line)

string.name: settings_google_drive_sync_summary_on
string.translation_description: In the 'Sync to Google Drive' setting, the summary explaining that all tracks will be synced to a Google Drive account. %1$s account name. E.g., 'foo@foo.com'.

string.translation_description: In the 'Map' settings, under the 'Fixed thresholds' section, the option to configure the top medium speed. Character limit: ~23 (1 line)

string.translation_description: In the 'Map' settings, under the 'Dynamic thresholds' section, the option to configure the medium speed range as a percentage from the average speed. Character limit: ~23 (1 line)

string.translation_description: In the 'Map' settings, under the 'Dynamic thresholds' section, the summary for the 'Percentage from average' option explaining that the medium speed range is set as a percentage from the average speed. %1$d an integer value. E.g., '15'.

resources.string: 中速范围设为平均速度的%1$d%%

string.translation_description: In the 'Map' settings, under the 'Fixed thresholds' section, the option to configure the top slow speed. Character limit: ~23 (1 line)

string.translation_description: In the 'Map' settings, the picker to select how track color is configured. Character limit: ~23 (1 line)

string.translation_description: In the 'Map' settings, for the 'Track color' picker, the option to use dynamic thresholds to set slow, medium, and fast speed when coloring a track based on speed. Character limit: ~20 (1 line)

string.translation_description: In the 'Map' settings, the summary for the 'Track color' picker when the 'Dynamic thresholds' is selected explaining that it uses dynamic thresholds to set slow, medium, and fast speed when coloring a track based on speed.

string.name: settings_map_track_color_mode_fixed_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Map' settings, the summary for the 'Track color' picker when the 'Fixed thresholds' is selected explaining that it uses fixed thresholds to set slow, medium, and fast speed when coloring a track based on speed.

resources.string: 在根据速度设置路线颜色时，使用固定阈值设置不同的速度：慢速、中速和高速

string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the summary for the 'Auto-resume' setting when 'Always' is selected.

string.name: settings_recording_auto_resume_track_timeout_never_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the summary for the 'Auto-resume' setting when 'Never' is selected.

string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the title to configure the default activity type for a new track. E.g., 'hiking'. Character limit: ~23 (1 line)

string.translation_description: The phrase for 'other' tracks. This is used when the language does not require special treatment of the given quantity (as with all numbers in Chinese). See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals %1$d an integer number.

string.translation_description: For voice announcement, to say 'other' seconds, 'other' means for cases that the language does not require special treatment of the given quantity. %1$d an integer number.

string.translation_description: For voice announcement, to say 2 seconds.

string.name: voice_seconds_zero
string.translation_description: For voice announcement, to say 0 seconds.

string.name: voice_template
string.translation_description: For the voice announcement, the template to make an announcement. %1$s distance string. E.g., '2.2 kilometers'. %2$s time string. E.g., '20 minutes 1 second'. %3$s speed/pace string. E.g., '2.2 miles per hour' for speed and '30 minutes 1 second per kilometer' for pace.
